item.description:
Fidelity's Trading Tools Explained: 5:30-6:30PM Sept 24


To attend this BostonIBD Premeeting, please RSVP!


Fidelity Investments Cambridge Center is offering a special seminar to IBD Boston on its Trading Tools: Active TraderPro and Wealth Lab Pro. The seminar is one hour, beginning at 5:30PM on Sept 24, leaving plenty of time to get to the regular meeting. Fidelity is at 238 Main St in Cambridge (between Hayward and Wadsworth). They validate parking at the One Broadway Garage (entrance on Third St, adjacent to the Zigo restaurant sign).


Fidelity, which claims to have the best tools in the business, will review their online and software-based trading tools, demonstrating how technical analysis relates to risk management and entry/exit strategies, covering conditional orders, directed trading and customized charting and demonstrating the ability to design, build, back-test and execute customized trading strategies.


Judith Warren, an IBD meetup member, has arranged this addition to our meeting. Soft drinks and light refreshments will be available. You can ask her questions at Judiwar@verizon.net.


Map to premeeting location: http://www.mapquest.c...
item.how_to_find_us: Judith Warren is the organizer of this event. She is a member of Boston IBD.
item.name: Boston IBD Premeeting: Fidelity's Trading Tools Explained
